name.description: Name of the volume, e.g. 'data-volume', 'logs', etc.

items.description: A volume to add to the sandbox

sandboxId.description: The ID of the sandbox to which the volume belongs. This is used to associate the volume with a specific sandbox environment.

name.description: Name of the volume, e.g. 'data-volume', 'logs', etc.

path.description: The path within the sandbox where the volume will be mounted, e.g. '/data', '/logs', etc.

readOnly.description: Whether the volume should be mounted as read-only within the sandbox. Defaults to false (read-write).
